tool_description: Given a protein's uniprot id, this tool can answer questions related to this protein

required_parameters.name: question
required_parameters.example: What is the function of this protein

required_parameters.name: uniprot_id
required_parameters.description: The uniprot id of the given protein. If this is given and valid, we will use the sequence and structure from uniprot database

return_values.name: answer
return_values.description: The answer to the protein related question
